primary_phone.department: City of Las Vegas Parking Services
primary_phone.purpose: Confirm Phase-1 appeal mailing addresses and issuing authority routing.

sections.authority_name: City of Las Vegas Parking Services

serves.description: Parking citations issued within Las Vegas city limits under the municipal parking program.

how_to_recognize.notes: Citations are typically numeric; the ticket references a Notice of Infraction number.

submission_methods.notes: Level 1 appeals may be submitted via mail, email, or online through the city’s AIMS portal.

appeal_mail_to.department: City of Las Vegas Parking Services

confirm_by_phone.department: City of Las Vegas Parking Services
confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm this is the correct mailing address and procedure for Level 1 parking citation appeals.

verification.verified_source_note: Level 1 appeal form directs appellants to return the form to City of Las Vegas Parking Services at 350 S. City Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89106 with phone numbers【336443596262655†L160-L163】.

sections.authority_name: Clark County Code Enforcement Administrative Office

serves.description: Administrative and parking citations issued by Clark County Code Enforcement within unincorporated areas.

how_to_recognize.notes: County citations may include alphanumeric identifiers.

submission_methods.notes: To contest a county administrative citation, appellants must request a supervisor review or hearing in person at the Code Enforcement Office and submit a hearing request form with a deposit.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: Clark County’s Code Enforcement website instructs appellants to file hearing request forms in person; it does not provide a mailing address for appeal submissions【829047723666963†L56-L63】【829047723666963†L94-L104】.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm whether appeals can be mailed and obtain the correct mailing address if applicable.

verification.verified_source_note: County website describes payment and hearing process but does not list a mailing address for appeal submissions【829047723666963†L56-L63】【829047723666963†L94-L104】.

sections.authority_name: University of Nevada, Las Vegas Parking & Transportation Services

serves.description: Parking citations issued on UNLV campus property by Parking & Transportation Services.

how_to_recognize.notes: UNLV citations display a numeric citation number linked to the vehicle license plate.

submission_methods.notes: UNLV requires appellants to submit an official arbitration form with a deposit equal to the citation fee. Appeals can be filed online or in person at the Parking & Transportation Services office; a mailing address for appeal submissions is not provided and attendance is required【616833293299771†L359-L370】.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: UNLV’s Parking FAQ states appeals must be filed on an arbitration form with a deposit; they may be submitted online or in person. A mailing address for appeals is not provided【616833293299771†L359-L370】.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Verify whether a mailing address is available for parking citation appeals and confirm appeal procedures.

verification.verified_source_note: UNLV’s website explains appeal procedures but omits a mailing address; in-person arbitration or online submission is required【616833293299771†L359-L370】.

serves.description: Parking citations issued at Harry Reid International Airport facilities by the Department of Aviation.

how_to_recognize.notes: Airport citations may have alphanumeric identifiers and reference LAS or Airport Parking.

submission_methods.notes: The airport’s FAQ states that individuals who wish to appeal a parking citation must contact the Department of Aviation’s designated representative by phone; no mailing address is provided【474609952226979†L33-L38】. Appeals appear to be handled administratively over the phone or through the online portal.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: Harry Reid International Airport’s parking citation FAQ instructs individuals to contact the Department of Aviation’s representative at (702) 261‑5186 to appeal; it does not provide a mailing address【474609952226979†L33-L38】.

confirm_by_phone.department: Clark County Department of Aviation Parking Services
confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm the procedure for appealing airport parking citations and inquire if a mailing address exists for written appeals.

verification.verified_source_note: Airport FAQ states appeals must be made by contacting the Department of Aviation via phone; no mailing address is provided【474609952226979†L33-L38】.

blocking_issues: Clark County Code Enforcement, UNLV, and Harry Reid International Airport sections lack confirmed mailing addresses for appeals; official confirmation is needed.
Citation patterns for all sections have low confidence due to limited examples.
known_gaps: County, campus, and airport appeal processes require deposit or administrative contact; exact mail addresses must be confirmed by phone.
Additional campuses or special districts in Las Vegas (e.g., other universities or hospitals) may issue parking citations but were not identified.
